LibrarySystem

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • LibrarySystem.Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    The book class created to store all book's information in a class.

        To check the availability of book. (Someone can borrow or not)
        Returns:
        if "NULL" can borrow anyone, else not.

      • setAvailability

        protected void setAvailability(java.lang.String availability_)
        To change the availability of book. (Someone can borrow or not)
        Parameters:
        availability_ - the setting value. If "NULL" anyone can borrow, else not.

      • getBorrowed

        public java.lang.String getBorrowed()
        Who is borrowed the book.
        Returns:
        if "NULL" its free, else someone has it.

      • setBorrowed

        protected void setBorrowed(java.lang.String borrowStatus)
        To set borrow status,if "NULL" its free, anyone can borrow it, else the id of user (given with parameter) have it.
        Parameters:
        borrowStatus - the id of user who has it.
